# Taking his Chance

| runtime        =
| language       = Silent filmEnglish intertitles
| country        = Australia
| budget         =
| gross          =
}}
Taking his Chance is a 1914 film from director Raymond Longford based on a poem by Henry Lawson. It was one of two short films Longford made from poems by Lawson, the other being Trooper Campbell.
It is considered a lost film.
References
External links
*
*[http://www.poetrylibrary.edu.au/poets/lawson-henry/taking-his-chance-0002021 Full text of poem]
